extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     BIOL205.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 credits from BIOL301; BIOL341.

basic.description: The course examines various aspects of plant cell biology, physiology, and biochemistry including carbon and nitrogen metabolism (photosynthesis, respiration, etc.), water relations, mineral nutrition, response to environmental stress, roles of plant hormones, plant biotechnology.
basic.subject: BIOL
basic.title: Plant Physiology
